Coverage: Lake Havasu and surrounding area, Lake Havasu City, Havasu Landing, CA., Colorado River Area, Yucca area, and Parker, AZ area. 35 mi radius.
Sponsor: London Bridge Amateur Radio Association, Inc.
Notes: Repeater is set in AMS mode. Analog and Digital traffic handled.
Nets: LBARA Net: Tue at 18:30 moved to the 146.620 (-) PL 131.8 Crossman Peak Repeater. Skywarn and Local ARES is active on this repeater.
